title: Litany Of The Holy Mother Immaculately Conceived
content:
LITANY OF THE HOLY MOTHER
IMMACULATELY CONCEIVED.
(Dictated by the Holy Mother on 19 July 1943 in Siekierki, Poland)
(- For Private use Only -)
Lord, have mercy on us
Christ have mercy on us
Lord have mercy on us.
Christ hear us, Christ graciously hear us.
God, the Father of Heaven,
have mercy on us.
God, the Son, Redeemer of the world,
have mercy on us.
God, the Holy Ghost,
have mercy on us.
Holy Trinity, One God,
have mercy on us.
Mother Immaculately conceived,
Intercede for us.
Mother of God,
Intercede for us.
Mother of Heaven and Earth,
Intercede for us.
Mother of the whole world,
Intercede for us.
Mother who beared the God-Man,
Intercede for us.
Mother who cried under the Cross of Her Son,
Intercede for us.
Mother who kissed the Body taken down from the Cross,
Intercede for us.
Mother who was assumed with Her Body into Heaven,
Intercede for us.
Mother who was crowned in Heaven,
Intercede for us.
Mother of the Holy Rosary,
Intercede for us.
Mother of the Holy Scapular,
Intercede for us.
Mother of Peace,
Intercede for us.
Mother of the Polish Crown,
Intercede for us.
Mother of the Universe,
Intercede for us.
Queen of us,
Intercede for us.
Queen of the Polish Nation,
Intercede for us.
Queen and Guardian of every man,
Intercede for us.
Queen of orphans,
Intercede for us.
Queen of these poor children,
Intercede for us.
Queen and Mother of all Nations,
Intercede for us.
Queen of the Catholic Church,
Intercede for us.
Queen from Heaven of the redeemed persons,
Intercede for us.
Queen of Jesus' Heart,
Intercede for us.
Queen of all Hearts,
Intercede for us.
Queen of Sisters and Brothers who serve in honour of Mary,
Intercede for us.
Queen of the dying in You,
Intercede for us.
Queen of religious schools.
Intercede for us.
Lamb of God, who takes away the sins of the world,
spare us, O Lord.
Lamb of God, who takes away the sins of the world,
graciously hear us, O Lord.
Lamb of God, who takes away the sins of the world,
have mercy on us.
Holy Mother of God,
we escape to Your protection.
Please do not scorn our requests,
but please always redeem us from every wrong adventure.
O, Our Lady,
Our Intercessor,
Our Intermediary,
Our Comforter,
Please reconcile us with Your Son,
Please recommend us to Your Son.
Please give us to Your Son.
Amen.
